title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
We found Mizora at Wyrm's Rock fortress. She insisted we attend Gortash's ordination and seek her out afterwards.

After you find Gortash in Wyrm's Rock Fortress, you will be invited to his inauguration upstairs. Attend the ceremony to fulfill the objective. This will update the journals for Rescue the Grand Duke.

Return to Mizora.

The ceremony is over. We should return to Mizora.
